• You will be asked if you still 
have any vaginal discharge 
and whether you have had 
a period yet.
• Tell your doctor if:
 - you are having trouble 
  holding in urine or wind, or 
  you are soiling yourself; 
 - intercourse is painful; 
 - you are feeling very
